card.title: Apollo 12
card.longDescription: First space flight mission of the Apollo Program to carry astronauts beyond low Earth orbit, reach Earth's moon, orbit it and return safely to Earth. Crew :Frank Borman, James Lovell, William Anders. 1st manned flight with the Saturn V rocket. Second mission of the Apollo Program. The primary objectives for the Apollo 7 engineering test flight were simple: Demonstrate command and service module, or CSM, and crew performance
